SVGAngle.summary: The SVGAngle interface is used to represent a value that can be an {{cssxref("<angle>")}} or {{cssxref("<number>")}} value.

remarks.para: The SVGAngle returned from and is read only, but the SVGAngle returned from is writable. When designated as read only, attempts to modify the object will result in an exception being thrown.

An SVGAngle object can be associated with a particular element. The associated element is used to determine which element's content attribute to update if the object reflects an attribute. Unless otherwise described, an SVGAngle object is not associated with any element.
Every SVGAngle object operates in one of two modes:
